Week 1.Monday:
Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping jacks, squats, and lunges
1. Push-ups: 3 sets of 10 reps
2. Dumbbell bicep curls: 3 sets of 10 reps
3. Tricep dips: 3 sets of 10 reps
4. Plank: 3 sets of 30 seconds
5. Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching
Week 1.Tuesday:
Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping jacks, squats, and lunges
1. Squats: 3 sets of 10 reps
2. Lunges: 3 sets of 10 reps
3. Dumbbell deadlifts: 3 sets of 10 reps
4. Leg curls: 3 sets of 10 reps
5. Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching
Week 1.Thursday:
Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping jacks, squats, and lunges
1. Push-ups: 3 sets of 10 reps
2. Dumbbell shoulder press: 3 sets of 10 reps
3. Dumbbell lateral raises: 3 sets of 10 reps
4. Dumbbell front raises: 3 sets of 10 reps
5. Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching
Week 1.Friday:
Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping jacks, squats, and lunges
1. Crunches: 3 sets of 10 reps
2. Bicycle crunches: 3 sets of 10 reps
3. Leg raises: 3 sets of 10 reps
4. Russian twists: 3 sets of 10 reps
5. Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching
